name: Mori (itch) (MasterOfCheese)
description:
An 8-bit adventure game inspired by classic Legend Of Zelda with some bullet hell elements. 

Play as Ranger Rick, a forest ranger who's car has broken down in the danger filled woods!  Ranger Rick must  collect parts around the woods in order to repair his truck, while  also avoiding the many strange and dangerous creatures that inhabit the woods...

The game takes an estimated 20 mins to beat.

The entire game was made using Unity in roughly 3 months  as a learning experience. Thank the Lord I was able to finish it.

Controls

WASD- to move

E- to interact with objects

Q- to fire weapon(Once acquired)

The Linux build is not really tested, so it may be buggy

Feel free to share any bugs found!
